attributes.action: Hm Forces pension's should recive £15,000 Tax free sum
attributes.additional_details:
We call upon the Government to give Ex Force's a better Tax free amount on their pension's.

The aim of this petition is as follows:

To ask the Goverment to re-think their stance on the Tax free sum that the Ex forces recive on their pension when reciving a Forces pension and working after leaving the Her Majesty Forces.

Introduce a new law, Protecting all Ex members of  Her Majesty Forces in Recite of a Her Majesty Forces pension to recive a tax free sum of £15,000 a year.

The Tax free sum should Raise from £10,000 to £15,000 on all that have served and is in recite of a Her Majesty Forces pension.
